member.name: P:ServiceStack.Azure.Messaging.ServiceBusMqServer.RequestFilter
member.summary: Execute global transformation or custom logic before a request is processed. Must be thread-safe.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.Azure.Messaging.ServiceBusMqServer.ResponseFilter
member.summary: Execute global transformation or custom logic on the response. Must be thread-safe.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.Azure.Messaging.ServiceBusMqServer.PublishResponsesWhitelist
member.summary: Opt-in to only publish responses on this white list. Publishes all responses by default.

member.name: P:ServiceStack.Azure.Messaging.ServiceBusMqServer.DisableNotifyMessages
member.summary: Disable publishing .outq Messages for Responses with no return type
